item.description:
Need a break? How about we rotate our karaoke night to Wed this week and Smokey Bones, in front of the Pheasant Lane Mall, Nashua, for food, drinks and KARAOKE! Chris is the KJ here on Wednesdays! (Sun Plaza on Fridays)

We're eatin at 8, singin and 50 cent sliders (yumm) at 9, quitin when they throw us out! Join us! Cheap $2.50 22oz Coors Light drafts and $3 Icebreaker mixed drinks all thru Feb too! Also use their coupons and cards if you have 'em! Hmm, looks like apps are 1/2 price after 9:30, might wanna eat late! Also, Wells (?), Calls (??) and house wines are $3.50 at all times. Here's the menu: http://www.smokeybone... We usually have a couple of booths right in the center section to the right of the bar. RIGHT in the middle of the action! You don't have to sing, but we do group songs where you can FAKE IT with the rest of us! Everyone has a great time whether they sing or not. We even do a little dancin there too!

From the south, take exit 36 and hang a right at the light and next left. (across from the Tyngsboro Plaza Theaters & KFC)

From the north, you CAN go there from exit 1, BUUUUT its _11_ lights! 8-) I live there, _I_ get on the highway south into Mass, get off at exit 35, right onto Rte 113, left at Daniel Webster (where the bridge is) and up to the Mall the 'back way'! :-) Smokey Bones is right BEFORE the Mall that way too! :-) Either way, your choice.

See you there! :-D

Tom D'A 603-521-7610 before, c603-682-2412 during
item.name: Smokey Bones Wed Karaoke, Pheasant Lane Mall
